pull.title: build: avoid getifaddrs when unavailable
pull.body: These changes from @theuni help building when targeting platforms that don't always have getifaddrs available like Android < 24

verification.payload:
tree e38a99ab0f436e22098f6890ba4624541af6fd96
parent 2070a545e2c4e8c2dff4c0fb40b8fd2f68fc2cad
author Cory Fields <cory-nospam-@coryfields.com> 1532024465 -0400
committer Lawrence Nahum <lawrence@greenaddress.it> 1535808303 +0200

build: avoid getifaddrs when unavailable

events.body: Should we also guard the includes?

concept ACK

thanks for starting to upstream android stuff

Concept ACK

If anyone's interested in the Android work being done by @greenaddress, there's a fair bit of discussion in #11844.
Sorry for missing this while I was away. Post-merge utACK.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -727,6 +727,10 @@ fi
 
 AC_CHECK_HEADERS([endian.h sys/endian.h byteswap.h stdio.h stdlib.h unistd.h strings.h sys/types.h sys/stat.h sys/select.h sys/prctl.h])
 
+AC_CHECK_DECLS([getifaddrs, freeifaddrs],,,
+    [#include <sys/types.h>
+    #include <ifaddrs.h>]
+)
comments.body: Seems a bit simpler overall to add ifaddrs.h to `AC_CHECK_HEADERS` above, as it seems android does not include the header at all, and switch on `HAVE_SYS_TYPES_H` and `HAVE_IFADDERS_H`

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -727,6 +727,10 @@ fi
 
 AC_CHECK_HEADERS([endian.h sys/endian.h byteswap.h stdio.h stdlib.h unistd.h strings.h sys/types.h sys/stat.h sys/select.h sys/prctl.h])
 
+AC_CHECK_DECLS([getifaddrs, freeifaddrs],,,
+    [#include <sys/types.h>
+    #include <ifaddrs.h>]
+)
comments.body:
android has them but not in all versions.

Only from android 24 onwards

see https://android.googlesource.com/platform/prebuilts/ndk/+/dev/platform/sysroot/usr/include/ifaddrs.h
